npcs.name: Mara Quayside
npcs.notes: Trades in gray shipments; responsive to favors and quiet coin.

npcs.name: Captain Rusk
npcs.notes: Keeps river lanes secure; dislikes smugglers.

npcs.name: Priestess Lyria
npcs.notes: Seeks pious donations and moral optics.

npcs.name: Brinna Ledger
npcs.notes: Can massage ledgers or fast-track payments.

npcs.name: Harl Stonebreaker
npcs.notes: Oversees city wall repairs; needs materials and protection.

npcs.name: Tomas Stagewright
npcs.notes: Courts elite with performances; shapes public mood.

npcs.name: Ira Coppervein
npcs.notes: Controls ore shipments; wary of taxes and raids.

requests.title: Quiet Berth at Dusk
requests.request_text: Greetings, advisor—could you secure a quiet berth at dusk so my barge avoids inspection?

links.note: River patrol grows suspicious of uninspected barges.

requests.title: Rare Cargo Discretion
requests.request_text: Could you ensure the clerk records my cargo as grain rather than curiosities this once?

links.note: Temple goodwill eases later appeal.

requests.title: Names for Night Watch
requests.request_text: Could you trade me names from the night watch so I avoid their keenest eyes?

links.note: Rusk can shuffle patrols once leak is admitted.

requests.title: Plug a Small Ledger Gap
requests.request_text: Might you authorize a discreet transfer to conceal an irregular ledger gap?

links.note: Frozen funds slow Brinna’s office.

requests.title: Temporary Tax Relief for Masons
requests.request_text: Could you endorse a temporary tax relief for the masons to speed wall repairs?

links.note: Cheaper to run extra crews with relief.

requests.title: Publish a Clean Ledger Page
requests.request_text: Would you have the scribe publish a clean ledger page to reassure the guilds?

links.note: Pre-cleared page speeds stamping.

requests.title: Archive Stamp for Legitimacy
requests.request_text: Might you obtain an archive stamp so this ledger page bears official weight?

links.note: No stamp weakens temple optics.

requests.title: Quiet Redaction of a Name
requests.request_text: Could you permit a quiet redaction of a troublesome name from the court rolls?

links.note: Stage apology pairs with redaction.

requests.title: Copyist Overtime
requests.request_text: Would you fund overtime for copyists so edicts go out by dawn?

links.note: Faster edicts improve patrol readiness.

requests.title: Raid Warning Along the Bend
requests.request_text: Could you authorize riders to warn villages along the bend of a likely raid?

links.note: Unwarned villages suffer, miners resist levies.

requests.title: Reassign the Keen Watch
requests.request_text: Would you back reassigning my keenest watchmen to the river gates this week?

links.note: Less scrutiny at secondary gate helps Mara.

requests.title: Confiscate False Seals
requests.request_text: Could you sanction a sweep to confiscate false seals among vendors?

links.note: Reprinting seals follows the sweep.

requests.title: Public Blessing for Stability
requests.request_text: Would you arrange a public blessing so the people see order restored?

links.note: Blessing primes an audience for spectacle.

requests.title: Food Alms for the Wharf
requests.request_text: Could you spare coin for temple alms so hunger does not sour the wharf?

links.note: Public goodwill boosts theatre at the docks.

requests.title: Temple Rebuke of Smuggling
requests.request_text: May I issue a moral rebuke against smuggling from the temple steps?

links.note: Public rebuke increases scrutiny at docks.

requests.title: Fast-Track Disbursement
requests.request_text: Could you authorize fast-track disbursement to keep contractors loyal?

links.note: No fast cash makes overtime pricier.

requests.title: Reprint Treasury Seals
requests.request_text: Might you fund a reprint of treasury seals to prevent forgeries?

links.note: Clean seals support public ledger optics.

requests.title: Side Ledger for Expedites
requests.request_text: Could you authorize a side ledger for expedite fees to keep things moving?

links.note: Creates context for Averin’s gap fix.

requests.title: Overtime Crews on the Wall
requests.request_text: Could you fund overtime crews so we may set new stone before the rains?

links.note: Momentum justifies new quarry permit.

requests.title: Temporary Quarry Permit
requests.request_text: Would you obtain a temporary quarry permit so we tap fresh stone near the river?

links.note: Convoys need escort after quarry opens.

requests.title: Royal Wall Inspection
requests.request_text: Could you arrange a royal inspection to boost worker morale and loosen purses?

links.note: Public mood improved for staged apology.

requests.title: Staged Apology to Soothe Tempers
requests.request_text: Might you permit a brief stage play that apologizes for recent missteps at court?

links.note: Apology paves way for pageant.

requests.title: Wharfside Morality Play
requests.request_text: Could you license a small morality play at the wharf to calm tempers?

links.note: Calm wharf aids warning riders.

requests.title: Grand Pageant of Unity
requests.request_text: Would you fund a grand pageant to display unity between guilds and crown?

links.note: Public unity improves ledger reception.

requests.title: Copper Levy Adjustment
requests.request_text: Could you ease the new copper levy so wages don’t revolt?

links.note: Angry miners less likely to help patrols.

requests.title: Secure Ore Convoy
requests.request_text: Would you assign escorts so our ore convoy reaches the foundry intact?

links.note: Smugglers seek watchman names after escorts tighten.

requests.title: Foundry Crucible Upgrade
requests.request_text: Might you fund better crucibles so spillage stops eating our profit?

links.note: Improved output justifies quick payments.

game_log.immediate_consequence: Low coin spend, slight mason favor, opens overtime crews later.
Coins spent to publish ledger; unlocks archive stamp.
Artisans annoyed; overtime later gets tougher.

steps.reason: Preserve coins early while gaining smuggler leverage and a small payout.
steps.aftereffects: Gain 2 coins now, smuggler favor rises, unlocks rare cargo later; Rusk grows wary.

steps.reason: Cheaper legitimacy boost that primes later archive stamp.
steps.aftereffects: Spend 1 coin; merchants calm; archive stamp becomes easier next day.

steps.reason: Use riverfolk favors to cut coin cost on a high-impact security action.
steps.aftereffects: Spend 3 coins; guards favor rises; ore convoy unlocks and is safer.

steps.reason: Late-game reputation spike to cement stability.
steps.aftereffects: Spend 10 coins; large reputation gain; boosts acceptance of public ledger narratives.

example_player_path.summary: The path leans on early smuggler bargain for coin relief, legitimizes finances with scholarly optics, shifts mid-game to river security using favors to save coins, and finishes with a costly but powerful pageant to secure reputation and stabilize the realm.
